title: Marionettes: construction and manipulation
brief_description: A detailed description of the construction of Bobo, a glove puppet, at the Universal School of Handicraft Marionette Theatre. When Bobo is finished and dressed, and his controls for manipulation attached, Mrs. Goedeler demonstrates how Bobo is manipulated. He is seen in action with a trained seal.
